TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象将传递到事件的任何处理程序 。The object is passed to any handler for the event. 属性包含将删除的数据。The property contains the data that will be deleted. 如果表示数据源的对象在删除数据之前引发验证异常，则该 属性将包含类的实例 。If the object that represents the data source throws a validation exception before it deletes the data, the property contains an instance of the class. 您可以通过属性检索所有验证异常 。You can retrieve all the validation exceptions through the property. 如果未引发验证异常，则 属性将包含 `null` 。If no validation exception is thrown, the property contains `null`. 如果处理验证异常并且不希望重新引发异常，请将 属性设置为 `true` 。If you handle the validation exceptions and do not want the exception to be re-thrown, set the property to `true`. 为事件创建事件处理程序以 验证数据、检查数据类中的验证错误或取消删除操作。You create an event handler for the event to validate the data, to examine validation errors from the data class, or to cancel the delete operation. 通过将属性设置为，可以取消删除操作 `true` 。You cancel the delete operation by setting the property to `true`. 默认情况下，该 控件将数据源中的原始值存储在网页的视图状态中，只不过其 特性被标记为 `UpdateCheck.Never` 。By default, the control stores the original values from the data source in view state in the Web page, except those whose attribute is marked as `UpdateCheck.Never`. LINQ to SQL 会在删除数据之前自动检查数据的完整性。LINQ to SQL automatically checks the integrity of the data before deleting the data. 它通过将数据源中的当前值与存储在视图状态中的原始值进行比较来实现此功能。It does this by comparing the current values in the data source with the original values that are stored in view state. 您可以通过为事件创建处理程序来执行其他数据验证 。You can perform additional data validation by creating a handler for the event. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何根据属性中的属性和网页中的值取消删除操作 。The following example shows how to cancel the delete operation based on a property in the property and a value from the Web page. 在此示例中，用户必须选择一个 控件，以便在其 `OnSale` 属性设置为时确认是否要删除该产品记录 `true` 。In the example, users must select a control to confirm that they want to delete a product record when its `OnSale` property is set to `true`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting/cs/Default.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting/vb/Default.aspx.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取在执行删除操作之前验证数据时引发的异常。

span.span: Gets the exception that was thrown while the data was being validated before the delete operation.

value.span: 如果发生错误，则为该异常；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在执行删除操作之前引发验证异常，则该异常将存储在 属性中。If a validation exception is thrown before the delete operation is performed, the exception is stored in the property. 在事件的事件处理程序中 ，可以通过属性检索异常 。In an event handler for the event, you can retrieve the exception through the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExceptionHandled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the exception was handled and that it should not be thrown again.

value.span: 如果异常已得到处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the exception was handled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以为事件创建事件处理程序 ，以检查在删除操作之前引发的验证异常。You can create an event handler for the event to examine validation exceptions that were thrown before the delete operation. 如果处理异常，而不希望再次引发异常，则将 属性设置为 `true` 。If you handle the exception and do not want it to be thrown again, set the property to `true`. 如果未将 属性设置为，则 `true` 异常将传播到调用堆栈中的下一个事件处理程序。If you do not set the property to `true`, the exception will be propagated to the next event handler in the call stack.

summary.span: 获取表示要删除数据的对象。

span.span: Gets the object that represents the data to delete.

value.span: 具有 属性中指定类型的对象，该对象包含要删除的数据。

span.span: An object of the type specified in the property that contains the data to delete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 删除数据之前，可以使用属性与数据进行交互。You can use the property to interact with the data before it is deleted. 您可以验证数据，也可以通过将属性设置为来取消该事件 `true` 。You can validate the data, or you can cancel the event by setting the property to `true`. 通过在属性中更改对象的值，可以修改要删除的记录 。You can modify which record is deleted by changing the value or values of the object in the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何根据属性中的属性和网页中的值取消删除操作 。The following example shows how to cancel the delete operation based on a property in the property and a value from the Web page. 在此示例中，用户必须选择一个 控件，以便在其 `OnSale` 属性设置为时确认是否要删除该产品记录 `true` 。In the example, users must select a control to confirm that they want to delete a product record when its `OnSale` property is set to `true`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting/cs/Default.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting/vb/Default.aspx.vb#1)]
